title: Interpretation of an airplane in a dream

preview.html: Do you know what is the interpretation of an airplane in a dream? This dream is so mysterious that some do not initially understand its meaning and what it actually shows. In fact, the plane refers to the trip to a far place outside the borders of the country, and it also indicates the beginning of a new life, whether in the case of immigration and obtaining a new job opportunity, but what about its presence in the dream, does it bode well or indicate that something bad will happen? What we will know in an encyclopedia that provides you with the interpretation of this dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaning for single, married and pregnant women. Interpretation of the plane in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned that traveling by plane in a dream is good news for the fulfillment of the desires that the dreamer was looking for in the dream. If a man sees a plane crash in In his dream, this symbolizes his inability in reality to achieve the dreams he seeks. Ibn Sirin interpreted flying a plane in a dream as a symbol that the dreamer is a person who is able to bear responsibility and deserves to be relied upon. Whoever sees in a dream that he is boarding a plane while in reality he is suffering From a chronic illness, this dream means the death of the dreamer, and God knows best. Whoever sees in his dream that he is afraid to board a plane, this indicates that the dreamer is suffering in reality from many psychological problems and pressures. Landing the plane in a dream indicates the end of problems and difficulties in reality. If a man sees in His dream is that the plane is falling, then this indicates weakness and failure in achieving the goals that the dreamer seeks. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a small plane in a dream as symbolizing superiority and success in reality and change for the better. Whoever dreams that he is flying a small plane, this indicates success and excellence in Reality. A large plane in a dream indicates success and distinction and the dreamer who reaches a prominent position in education. Whoever sees a plane landing in his dream, this indicates that he will fall into a financial crisis that will end soon, and God knows best. To dream of a plane in a dream also means marrying a rich woman or Traveling soon, and God knows best. The plane in a single woman’s dream, and whoever dreams that she is riding a plane, this indicates the approaching date of engagement or marriage if she is engaged, and God knows best. The plane crash in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the failure of her romantic relationship in reality. Whoever sees in her dream that she is getting off The ladder of the plane indicates the security and happiness that the dreamer feels with whomever he will marry, and God knows best. Seeing a plane in the dream of an unmarried woman means that she will have the opportunity to travel to work abroad and it may also indicate that she will get married soon. Interpretation of an plane in a dream for a married woman: Seeing the plane in A married woman’s dream means that in reality she is vulnerable to marital infidelity, and God knows best. A plane landing in a married woman’s dream indicates stability in her married life, with the exception of marrying a generous person. Flying a plane in a married woman’s dream indicates her husband’s success in reality. A plane crash in a woman’s dream Married symbolizes failure in marriage. Interpretation of an airplane in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing an airplane in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the approaching date of childbirth.

title: Interpretation of seeing Eid al-Fitr in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Eid al-Fitr by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin narrates that seeing Eid al-Fitr in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate good deeds. Eid al-Fitr in a dream is also good news for the dreamer to put an end to his problems and remove his worries and sorrows. Eid al-Fitr always shows in a dream enjoying a calm and happy life and a stable life that he enjoys. By the dreamer. Seeing Eid in a dream indicates acceptance of repentance and shows the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty. Eid is generally in a prisoner’s dream, as it heralds an end to his suffering and imprisonment and the enjoyment of freedom soon. See also: What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing Eid in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi? Eid al-Fitr in a dream for single women. The interpretation of a dream about Eid prayer for a single woman in general is one of the praiseworthy visions for a girl and indicates the fulfillment of wishes and desires. In her dream, Eid is also seen as a sign of ending her worries, alleviating her distress, and changing her life for the better. Seeing a festival in a dream means joy and happiness. And enjoy a future life full of good news, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Eid cakes in a dream. Seeing Eid al-Fitr in a dream for a married woman. Seeing Eid al-Fitr in a dream for a married woman indicates that good things will happen to her and portends achieving goals. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Eid al-Fitr crescent for a married woman With good news and the fulfillment of the woman’s long-awaited desires, and it may be the result of her approaching pregnancy, and God knows best. Eid in a dream shows a stable life without problems and obstacles and a woman enjoying married life without worry. See also: Interpretation of seeing balloons in a dream. Seeing Eid al-Fitr in a dream for a pregnant woman. Eid in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the arrival of many good things and food for her next life. The celebration also indicates that the pregnant woman’s prayer is accepted by God and relieves her of her worries and anguish, and God knows best. Eid in general in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the ease of childbirth and the soonest date of her birth without trouble and misery. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about Eid for divorced women. Interpretation of seeing Eid in a dream for a divorced woman is evidence of her freedom from the problems and difficulties that she suffers from. If a divorced woman sees herself greeting children on Eid al-Fitr, this indicates the disappearance of her worries. Seeing a break for Eid al-Fitr in a dream is Among the desired dreams, it indicates goodness and large and ample food. Interpretation of greeting in a dream The presence of someone in a dream congratulating the dreamer on the celebration indicates the nearness of relief and the end of problems and worries. Also, congratulations on holidays in general indicate the arrival of joys and happiness and the fulfillment of long-awaited desires and desires. Congratulations on Eid In a dream, it is one of the good visions that indicate a future life full of goodness and pleasure, and God is the Most High. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Day of Arafat in a dream in detail. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing hazelnuts in a dream?

preview.html: Khadot website offers you a complete interpretation of seeing hazelnuts in a dream. Hazelnuts are a type of nut known in many places around the world. Hazelnuts are known for their tremendous benefits to the human body, dealing with serious diseases such as aging. And Alzheimer's disease. Many people also see hazelnuts in a dream complete, so we present to you, dear followers, details about the interpretation of seeing hazelnuts in a complete dream for single and pregnant women, as well as for men, from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. If you are interested in learning the interpretation of a dream about hazelnuts, then all What you have to do is follow the article.Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing hazelnutsWhy dream of seeing hazelnuts in a dream Kamel Ibn Sirin says that this is evidence of generosity and refers to a person who gives a lot of goodness to people.Seeing whole hazelnuts in a dream indicates the presence of a loved one among the common people. Seeing hazelnuts in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will have a lot of food, which he will collect in his life, but after adversity and adversity. There are rotten walnuts in a dream – a sign that a disabled and morally corrupt person is next to the dreamer in his life. And hazelnuts in a dream according to some People can refer to problems and experiences and the dreamer’s experience of a kind of sadness in his life. Why do single women dream of nuts? The interpretation of using hazelnuts for a single woman is one of the dreams that indicate happiness and good news in the coming life. The interpretation of seeing hazelnuts in a dream full of public women is a sign of changes Which will happen to her in her life and in her marriage to a rich man. Seeing walnuts for a girl in a dream is a sign of undesirable things and evidence of the presence of a stingy and obstructive person in her life. Why does a married woman dream of nuts? Eating whole hazelnuts in a dream for a married woman testifies to the stability of her family life and the end of All her problems are with her husband. Seeing whole hazelnuts in a dream and eating them is tasteless, which tells a married woman that she is dissatisfied. Seeing whole hazelnuts for a woman in a dream speaks of generosity, generosity, and the good reputation for which she is famous among ordinary people. Seeing a pregnant hazelnut in a dream full indicates interpretation A pregnant woman who eats hazelnuts in a dream indicates that she will face some difficulties during pregnancy and childbirth. Buying hazelnuts for a pregnant woman in a complete dream is good news and evidence of activity, comfort and peace, and this is one of the desired visions. Seeing hazelnuts in a complete dream for a man. Seeing hazelnuts in a dream shows a man his strength. And his resilience and ability to withstand difficult life situations. For a man to eat whole hazelnuts in a dream means kindness and a lot of food that he will receive in his next life. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a prince in a dream by senior scholars?

preview.html: A prince in a dream is one of those somewhat strange visions, and this is what prompts the viewer to see what this vision hides from him in terms of hidden meanings and confuses them. Should the dreamer be exposed to something embarrassing?! We will explain this to our followers in the following lines, just follow us. Prince in a dream The interpretation of a dream about a prince in a dream is one of the good interpretations that indicate the dreamer’s ability to achieve what he wants, whether in practice or in academic life. Whoever sees a prince in his dream will obtain a new source of livelihood that will create Radical changes in his professional life and the dreamer will enjoy his position of power and a prestigious social cause. While the dreamer saw that the prince rebukes him in the dream, it is one of the shameful visions and shows that the dreamer has committed some illegal acts, either benefiting from forbidden sources or committing sins, and he must return to God And repentance. Watching the prince smiling in a dream, and the dreamer is suffering from problems and obstacles in the way of his progress, means that God’s departure is near and that these obstacles will be resolved and the dreamer will be able to reach his desired goals. The prince in a dream by Ibn Sirin According to what Ibn Sirin narrated, seeing the prince in a dream is one of Good dreams in which the dreamer dreams of hearing happy news and changes in his social circumstances. If the dreamer is single, he will get married, and if he is married, he will become the father of a boy. Seeing a prince in a dream and then removing him from his position and feeling a state of sadness and sorrow is a sign that the dreamer will lose his job, go through financial difficulties, and debts will accumulate on his shoulders. The dreamer’s vision of the prince is considered to be giving him The crown of the kingdom is one of the most promising dreams and indicates the dreamer’s ability to consolidate his family relationships and free him from the problems that were disturbing his life. If the dreamer sees a prince of a country different from the country in which he lives, this means that the dreamer will soon travel to that country to obtain a new source of livelihood. The prince In a dream of Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing a prince in a dream is one of the dreams that brings a lot of sustenance and blessings to the work. Seeing the dreamer who has become the prince of the country is one of the good dreams that indicate that the dreamer will assume a new position of importance and power and will succeed in performing the tasks assigned to him skillfully. Great. The dreamer sees that the prince shakes hands with him in a dream while he is suffering from a serious illness, is a sign that his health condition will improve and this crisis will pass peacefully. A prince in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Al-Osaimi mentioned that seeing the prince in a dream is a good vision and indicates that the dreamer will obtain a new life and be freed from... Problems and obstacles that prevented his progress. Seeing the prince in the middle of a large crowd is a sign that the dreamer will marry a girl he loves and God will bless him with a good boy. If the dreamer is in the stages of academic education and sees the prince in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer has reached the highest levels of education and is able to achieve The distinction that dazzles those around him. Enter the dream interpretation website on the Internet from Google and you will find all the interpretations you are looking for. A prince in a single woman’s dream. If he sees

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse that bit my leg. A mouse bite in a dream. A mouse bit me in a dream. A mouse bite in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about a mouse biting a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about a small mouse bite. I dreamed that a mouse bit me on my leg. Gordon enters into the dream. Ibn Sirin dreams of a mouse: an immoral woman, a thief, or a corrupt bed, and if it is a group and its colors are different Black and white, it is the nights and days that destroy ages and bodies. The immoral person said: Yes. He said: She will give birth to you a good son. Al-Nabulsi also interpreted the dream of a mouse: It is an immoral woman in a dream, and it was said that a cursed Jew grieves, or a veiled Jew or a thief, and a large mouse indicates livelihood. Blessing and grace, and whoever has a mouse has a slave, and that the mouse eats what the man eats, and the servant also eats what the master eats, and white and black mice indicate night and day. If he sees a mouse coming and going, black or white, his life will be extended, as white is for days and black is for night, and they said that the mouse is the people of the house and family. The woman conspires, and whoever sees many mice in an inclined position or in a well, this will be a deficiency in his life. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream of a mouse: It was interpreted by a woman with an ugly appearance and interior, and if its color is not the color of mice, then the woman does not interpret it. The number of mice, if they are of the same color, let the fortuneteller think about what they did for good or bad, and if they are different colors and found in a new place, then they are interpreted as longevity, and if they are different from him, then his expression is against him and money, and whoever saw a mouse It comes out of his nose, urethra, or anus, as this indicates an immoral person, and it is said that immorality comes out of her. his family. The thieves are seen entering that place and damaging them. Whoever sees a dead mouse in his hand indicates a calamity. Whoever sees that he stepped on a mouse and killed it declares his separation from the corrupt woman and gets along with her, and whoever sees a mouse in his bed shows a corrupt woman, and the dream of mouse meat is the money of the corrupt woman, and it was said that the mouse is malicious, immoral, and a liar, and the mouse is a thief who runs out, and the big mouse is an abundance of money. It is a blessing's death, and it was narrated that a man came to... Ibn Shirin said: I saw as if a mouse had entered, so she left her appointment and said: Are you pregnant? Interpretation of seeing a mouse - YouTubeInterpretation of a mouse in a dream - YouTube

The number of mice, if they are of the same color, let the fortuneteller think about what they did for good or bad, and if they are different colors and found in a new place, then they are interpreted as longevity, and if they are different from him, then his expression is against him and money, and whoever saw a mouse It comes out of his nose, urethra, or anus, as this indicates an immoral person, and it is said that immorality comes out of her. his family. The thieves are seen entering that place and damaging them. Whoever sees a dead mouse in his hand indicates a calamity. Whoever sees that he stepped on a mouse and killed it declares his separation from the corrupt woman and gets along with her, and whoever sees a mouse in his bed shows a corrupt woman, and the dream of mouse meat is the money of the corrupt woman, and it was said that the mouse is malicious, immoral, and a liar, and the mouse is a thief who runs out, and the big mouse is an abundance of money. It is a blessing's death, and it was narrated that a man came to... Ibn Shirin said: I saw as if a mouse had entered, so she left her appointment and said: Are you pregnant? Interpretation of seeing a mouse - YouTubeInterpretation of a mouse in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a barrel in a dream (tank) according to the most famous interpretive scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of the barrel in a dream (tank) by the most famous scholars of interpretation, as seeing the barrel in a dream is one of the dreams that arouses curiosity and many surprises, so we will go to this article to clarify and explain it for many who have wondered about it, as many dream scholars have contributed to clarifying the interpretations and interpretations of the dream about the barrel. The barrel in a dream (tank) by the most famous scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a barrel of water. Seeing a barrel in a man's dream indicates many things, including dreamers. These interpretations and interpretations include those that indicate changes and changes in life, which we will present through the interpretation of the interpretation of a dream about seeing a barrel of water, which we obtained as follows: It turns out that seeing a barrel is one of the visions that bode well for the fortuneteller, including that it can indicate profit and abundant money. While this vision may indicate things, hopes and desires that the dreamer wants to achieve. Seeing a barrel in a dream indicates a happy life and good news that a person may hear in the near future. Seeing a blue barrel in a dream also indicates hope and optimism. It also indicated the end of crises and the elimination of all problems and disputes. Also, seeing a yellow barrel may sometimes indicate illness or envy. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing tamarind in detail from Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Interpretation of a dream about a tank for a pregnant woman It has been found in many interpretation books that the dream of a tank or what is known as a barrel of water is one of the things that indicate a pregnant woman's dream with many indications. The tank as follows: Seeing a barrel in a dream means good news in a pregnant woman's dream. It also means great happiness that will prevail in her life in the very near future. In addition, seeing a full barrel in a dream is a sign of wealth and abundant money. While we saw the empty barrel was evidence of a lack of money. In addition, seeing a barrel in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence of life and well-being. See also: Interpretation of dreams of tiles in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its interpretations Interpretation of a dream of an oil barrel by scholars of interpretation It is possible that the barrel is used for many purposes, as it is no longer limited to water, as this has exceeded many uses, including oil and its storage, so this dream may return to many. Followed: Seeing a barrel of oil water indicates the disappearance of worries and many pains and disputes. Also, seeing a barrel of oil indicates illegitimate money. It can also indicate immorality and wars. This is in addition to the fact that the barrel of oil seen in a dream can indicate family problems and disputes, especially if it appears broken. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a spoon in a dream for a woman and a man Interpretation of breaking a barrel in a dream Interpretations of a dream about a barrel in a dream or a tank differ in many things depending on the path and content. These effects included seeing a broken barrel in a dream, which indicates good luck and may indicate: Seeing a barrel in a dream indicates

title: What is the interpretation of a squirrel in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: Squirrel in a dream: The squirrel is considered a very cute forest animal. It is common to see it on outings in Western countries. Some consider it a pet, and the squirrel is a shy animal in front of people. During this article, we will learn about what the squirrel appears in a dream and the most prominent signs and interpretations of the dream according to the details of the vision, the dreamer, and the words. Interpreters: Squirrel in a dream Seeing a squirrel in a dream means having children and good offspring. Other interpretations of seeing a squirrel in a dream indicate that the dreamer will be destined to see his victory over his enemies. Seeing a squirrel in a dream indicates happy days to come and indicates that joy and happiness will enter the dreamer’s life, and the squirrel is a symbol of good luck in the dreamer’s life. In the event that The dreamer is a sign of crisis and pain. In reality, seeing a squirrel in a dream means that his worries will go away, and he will be relieved of his suffering and replace it with comfort and happiness. The squirrel in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, says that seeing a squirrel in a dream is a sign of the fortuneteller’s benefit and the acquisition of many good things, and seeing a squirrel indicates that The fortuneteller will succeed in achieving his goals and achieving them. His goals. Ambitions. Killing a squirrel in a dream is one of the visions promising the dreamer his victory and overcoming the conspiracies that enemies and haters are planning against him in reality. Seeing a squirrel indicates that the dreamer’s situation will change for the better and be full of positive changes that he hoped would happen. A squirrel in a dream for Nabulsi. Imam Nabulsi believes that the dreamer’s vision A black squirrel in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face problems and be exposed to difficulties, but if the dreamer sees that a black squirrel is chasing him in a dream and the dreamer is able to successfully escape from it, this indicates that the dreamer will be able, with God’s grace, to escape from the problems he has faced in the recent period. Al-Nabulsi explains The squirrel in a person’s dream is a sign of bad luck, as well as a sign that the observer is committing sins and does not repent to God Almighty, so the dreamer must beware and hasten to repent and return to God. A squirrel in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Al-Osaimi interprets seeing a squirrel in a dream as a good vision. If a man sees that he is holding a squirrel in his arms, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will make a profit and earn the fruits of his labor. If the dreamer works in trade and saw in a dream that he was feeding a squirrel, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will make a profit and his trade will flourish on earth. Interpretation of a dream about Asrar is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. A squirrel in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a squirrel in a dream for an unmarried woman means that the dreamer will propose to her a young man with high morals and a good reputation. And an acceptable status. Seeing a yellow squirrel in a dream means that the dreamer will remove her sorrows and get rid of the tension and anxiety that control her, and that she will live a period of calm and tranquility. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of seeing medicinal herbs in a dream and their effects

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing medicinal herbs in a dream and their effects Medicinal herbs are among the things that contributed to the existence of alternative medicine, and it is one of the things that the world needed more in the past years, when medicine was not at its highest levels, and medicinal herbs do not have the harmful effects and side effects that characterize other medicines. And when we talk about herbs, it is worth directing our conversation to a dream about them, where we will discuss the interpretation of seeing medicinal herbs in a dream and their effects. And so, the dreamer, medicinal herbs, and it represents many interpretations, which are as follows: Therefore, seeing medicinal herbs in a dream, and it indicates the strength of a wise personality, but if the dreamer sees that he is eating medicinal herbs, it indicates the comfort and stability that the person experiences in his life, in addition to the indication of medicinal herbs in the relief and coming in the life of the dreamer. And happiness, God willing. Just as seeing medicinal herbs in a dream is for a man, it indicates the abundance of sustenance in his life. Likewise, seeing medicinal herbs in their usual place in the home is an indication of the distinguished status of the vision. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing black clothes in a dream and its effects. Interpretation of seeing juniper herb in a dream in reality. Juniper herb is considered one of Distinctive medicinal herbs. It is beneficial to humans and those who use it. Therefore, it is one of the trees that has many benefits. It is worth noting that people search for an interpretation by seeing medicinal herbs, especially juniper herb: In fact, seeing juniper herb in a dream means that the person sees juniper herb in a dream and to the next happiness in the life of the dreamer. In addition In addition, if a person sees a juniper plant and he eats it, then he earns money from this herb. Also, if an unmarried girl sees a juniper herb in a dream, it is a harbinger of success and success in her life, but if a sick person sees in his sleep, and eats juniper herb, it is a sign of his recovery from the disease. See also: Interpretation The dream of seeing evil in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of seeing flowers in a dream. In reality, flowers are among the herbs that are eaten and preferred by many, in addition to the many benefits that humans gain and the effect of consuming them, and therefore they contain a group of herbs. What is the great common benefit: In addition to that, seeing flowers in a dream indicates corruption of morals if their color is yellow, but If the dreamer drinks yellow flowers, it is a sign of diseases and illnesses. On the other hand, seeing flowers in a dream means bad luck, and it also indicates the bad reputation attributed to the dreamer. But if one sees that he plants flowers in a dream, it indicates the intelligence with which he masters Insight, specifically, the harvest of flowering herbs, which indicates a good situation for the person with the vision. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a cup of water in detail in...

title: Interpretation of a dream about imprisonment and crying in a dream by the great imams

preview.html: Many people dream of being imprisoned in a dream and screaming in it, which is an annoying dream and causes panic in women and men because of this dream. Questions about its meaning have increased, so in this article we will present an interpretation of dreams about imprisonment and crying to answer the questions of people who often see this dream. Interpretation of a dream about imprisonment and crying for a son SeriniIt is said that prison in a dream is an indication of the restrictions imposed by society in terms of customs, traditions and routines resulting from these problems, anxiety and sadness, and crying is the removal of these worries, problems and screaming. From all the restrictions and obstacles imposed by society, but crying with screams or verses is evidence of the growing problems and sorrow that surround the viewer. Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees himself imprisoned and crying but is satisfied with his lot, this indicates the long life of the dreamer, and it was also said that imprisonment indicates illness and crying. A sign of recovery and freedom from illness. It was also said that imprisonment is evidence that the dreamer has committed many sins and disobedience, and his intense crying in the dream is evidence of remorse for these sins. Whoever thinks that he is imprisoned and is crying and doing business, this is a sign of prosperity in his field of trade and that he has a lot in the field of business. His work. Interpretation of a dream about being imprisoned and crying for a married man: For a married man, a dream about being imprisoned and crying in it is an indication that his wife is an irresponsible person and that she does not satisfy his desires and does not raise her children in the desired manner. A married man’s dream about being in prison and crying in it is an indication that he bears very heavy burdens and responsibilities that fall on him. On his shoulders, and there is no one to help him carry it, and crying is a sign that he is suffering. To get out of these provisions and solve all problems. It is said that whoever saw a dream about prison and a married man was crying in it, this indicates that this husband was living a very miserable life, without all the joys of life and he cannot bear to live with her because of it. Many problems. Interpretation of a dream about prison and crying with guard dogs chasing him: If a person sees that he is in prison and cries, this indicates that he is getting rid of his worries, and if he sees himself in prison and crying, then the guard dogs in the prison were chasing him. This indicates the presence of some envious people and haters in his life and that they are seeking to get him into trouble and conspire against him. Interpretation of a dream about imprisonment and a woman crying. Interpretation of a dream about imprisonment and a single girl crying. It is said that if an unmarried girl sees that she is in prison and cries, this indicates that she will marry a person of high status. He has a great interest in politics or government, and she will be happy with him, and that was that. She also said that she will marry a rich man. Interpretation of a dream about imprisonment and a married woman crying. If a married woman sees that she is in prison, this indicates that her freedom is limited and that her husband is treating her badly and that there are problems and disputes between her and her husband. The imprisonment of a married woman is evidence that she or her husband has many debts. Crying is a sign that she has begun to pay off those debts. It was said that the imprisonment of a married woman is an indication of a serious illness affecting a member of her family, and crying is a sign and harbinger of recovery from that illness. Interpretation of a dream about imprisonment and a pregnant woman crying
